workflow-definition.name: City Profile Approval
workflow-definition.description: City Contact can update City Profile Content, Administrator can approve or reject modification.

notification.name: Review Notification
notification.description: Mayors Adapt: your city profile is ready to be filled in
notification.template:
Dear ${CITY_PROFILE_CONTACT_NAME_SURNAME},

Welcome to the Mayors Adapt city profile platform. We have set up a template which we would like you to fill in. All the information shared in this form, will be used to showcase and represent your city and your work on Climate-ADAPT. The more information you fill in, the better will be your cities impact within the community.

You can find your city profile management page here:

Please note that you have four weeks from now to complete the form. You can edit it, save it and then come back to edit it further at a later stage. Once you submit it, we will quality manage it and may come back to you with questions or suggestions in case anything is unclear.

After a final review by Mayors-ADAPT administrator, we will put the fact sheet online.

timer-notification.name: City Profile Edition Reminder Notification
timer-notification.description: Mayors Adapt: please remember to fill in your city profile
timer-notification.template:
Dear ${CITY_PROFILE_CONTACT_NAME_SURNAME},

Thank you for starting to fill in your registration form for your individual Mayors Adapt city profile fact sheet. Please note that your login will expire in one week, so please finalise you fact sheet and submit it so that we can go over it, ask for your final approval and publish it on the website.

You can find your city profile management page here:

Please note that you have one week from now to complete the form. You can edit it, save it and then come back to edit it further at a later stage. Once you submit it, we will quality manage it and may come back to you with questions or suggestions in case anything is unclear.

After a final review by Mayors-ADAPT administrator, we will put the fact sheet online.

For any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us at helpdesk@mayors-adapt.eu

timer-notification.name: City Profile Edition Expiration Notification
timer-notification.description: Mayors Adapt: Time for editing your city profile has expired
timer-notification.template:
Dear ${CITY_PROFILE_CONTACT_NAME_SURNAME},

Thank you for filling in your city profile fact sheet for ${CITY_PROFILE_CITY_NAME}. The time for editing has ended and the Mayors Adapt team will now review your input. We will get in touch with you in case any relevant information is still missing. Once we have jointly finalised the fact sheet and you have approved the content, we will publish it online.

For any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us at helpdesk@mayors-adapt.eu
